2098150.name: Orpheus
2098150.description:
My first solo indie game i started to work during my studying

Two Soulmates separated by death. In this game, you play as Orpheus from the greek myth. Travel through Hell and prove your strenght by defeating all ennemies and obstacles with the power of your lyre.

Orpheus is a first solo project i published on STEAM, started in 2022 for art license, i continue to develop it. In this game you play as Orpheus who go to hell for save Eurydice in a gameplay who mixed bullet hell and platformer.



- Platformer and Bullet Hell Gameplay

- 5 levels

- use your lyre to fight ennemies and make bounce to eliminate them

- inventory with multiple items given by gods

- 3 levels of difficulty (Assist, Normal and God Mode)



- Direction Key/QSDZ/Joystick - Move

- Backspace/E - Interact

- Left Mouse - Shoot

- UP key/Z/Joystick - Jump
